sense.name: take as a spouse; wed
sense.examples: Can you believe he married his high school sweetheart? Hannah and Sean will marry in June. She married into a fine old family.

sense.name: cause to become married
sense.examples: The minister married them in a lengthy ceremony. They were married by her cousin, who is a priest. Her parents married her to the neighboring land owner.

sense.name: (cause to) become united
sense.examples: I let the stew simmer for 6 hours, because the flavors marry better that way. I'm very interested in how different colors marry up with each other to create a striking web page. The chef married the wine with a special dish.
